channel.title: About alch price/% and selling prices to shop keepers
channel.description:
so when i alch i want the item to be worth more than what its alching for how can i fix this and also i want the shop keeper to sell for less and buy the items for more how do i do this please help i want to know how i can change the % of it
thank you!

item.title: About alch price/% and selling prices to shop keepers
item.dc:creator: @erlasz erlasz
item.description:
@erlasz wrote:

The prices in item.cfg don’t match up with the values in-game :s
I need to change the selling:buying price ratio to the shops as well, I can’t find that anywhere… could you give me a hand?

Thanks.

Read full topic
